translated: Ayman al-Zawahiri, born in Cairo in 1951, is supposed to be the leader of the Islamist movement al-Qaida group, since the death of Osama bin Laden in 2011 in Abbottabad (Pakistan).
original: Ayman al-Zawahiri, né au Caire en 1951, est supposé être le chef du mouvement islamiste radical al-Qaida, depuis la mort d'Oussama ben Laden en 2011 à Abbottabad (Pakistan).
